content.rendered:
Directed by Sriwass.

Written by Sriwass.

Cast Sai Srinivas Bellamkonda(Viswa). Pooja Hegde(Soundarya Lahari). R. Sarathkumar(Raju Garu (as Sarath Kumar)). Meena(Viswa’s Mother). Jagapathi Babu(Munuswamy). Ravi Kishan(Veeraswamy). Ashutosh Rana(Munuswamy’s 2nd Brother). Madhu Guruswamy(Munuswamy’s 3rd Brother). Kabir Duhan Singh(Viswa’s Business Rival). V. Jayaprakash(Siva Prasad). Pavitra Lokesh(Viswa’s Adopted Mother). Vennela Kishore(Viswa’s Friend). Rao Ramesh(Tagore). Krishna Murali Posani(Defense Lawyer). Sameer(Raju Garu’s Brother). Jhansi(Soundarya’s Sister). Brahmaji(Soundarya’s Brother-in-law). Krishna Bhagavan(Soundarya’s Paternal Uncle). Hema(Soundarya’s Aunt). Annapoorna(Soundarya’s Grandmother). Raghu Babu(Siva Prasad’s Assistant). Mahadevan(Munuswamy’s Aide). Kasi Vishwanath(Advocate Murthy). Surya Kumar Bhagawan Das(Hindu Saint). Ananth Babu(Priest). Anantha Sriram(Valmiki). Sri Pusapati(Cognos Developer). Hasini Anvi(Family Member). Karen Goeller(Temple Attendee). Hugo Salazar Jr.(Temple Attendee).Patricia Pinto. Victoria Mahal-Sky(Office Manager (uncredited)) .Mahesh Achanta.Sujeet Kumar Sharma. Deep Sheth(Man in the Temple).Gundu Sudharshan.Temper Vamsi

Language Telugu.

Producers Guru Bobba. Vivek Kuchibhotla. Abhishek Nama.

Production Abhishek Pictures.
